page.title: 08FUELS USED IN HOMES
page.content: A survey carried out by the children of class 3J showed that, out of 34 homes,the types of fuel used for heating, lighting and cooking are as follows: For heating, gas is used in 25 homes, coal is used in 8 homes, oil-fired heating is used in 2 homes. In one home gas and electricity is used,in another coal and oil. All homes have electric lighting. For cooking, electricity is used in 21 homes and gas in 16 homes. One home uses a gas cooker and an electric microwave-oven.One home uses an electric oven and a gas oven.
